title: Let's play a game
body:
Give a champion ability a completely useless passive or essentially restate the passive in a stupid way.

Example

Karthus gains 300% movement speed while channeling Requiem.

or

Upon rooting a target with Nautilus's passive, you can root another target at no extra cost.

GO
